Text:
Thanks. 
I need a help. can anybody plzzz upload.

Acute email ids production engine [software]. I need this very much. [16.05.2013]
getting an obfuscator.xz virus message. Can someone confirm that this is a false positive?
Anomaly2.exe ---> application failed to start 0x0142c error (or something like that)

pcbflare, sad as it is, the problem is in the crack. It will not work for Windows XP, and that's most likely the problem you're experiencing. I don't think anyone else made a different crack for the game, so XP users are out of luck.

Xaenor: yep, find that out myself by trying pretty much everything possible. With Van Helsing it helped me to use older steam_api.dll, but no such luck with Anomaly 2. Well the migration to W7 starts to seem unavoidable... Holy shit i got SOOO much data to move.
